department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Reissue of Bid Solicitation for two Personal watercrafts and one double trailer
description: Reissue of Bid Solicitation:...Supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS4413318494 dated April 19, 2024...All responses submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the submission being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Information

* **Tender Title**: K7A40-240771-B Personal Watercrafts and Double Trailer
* **Reference Number**: WS4413318494
* **Publication Date**: May 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: June 11, 2024

#### Description

This tender announcement is a reissue of the original bid solicitation, dated April 19, 2024. The original solicitation has been cancelled and superseded by this revised version. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request for bidders who submitted proposals for the original solicitation.

The amendments include a change to the closing time for the tender submission. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by June 13, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Any submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Requirements

The government is seeking to procure two Personal Watercrafts and one Double Trailer. This requirement is not security-related and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The lowest priced compliant proposal will be recommended for award.

#### Contact Information

* **End User Entity**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* **Contact Person**: Heureuse Saint-Juste (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [heureuse.saint-juste@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:heureuse.saint-juste@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information

* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19844295
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

This tender announcement is open to all eligible bidders, and proposals must be submitted in accordance with the guidelines and instructions outlined in the solicitation document. Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer active. It was initially issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Requirements:
You have to reorganize the different information into sections, label them correctly and remove unnecessary sections and data. User names have to be properly formatted, and text must be translated into official languages of Canada (French and English).
